verbs.description: [V: Listen] [ARG1: to Audio of Children Separated From Their Parents Inside Border Patrol Facilities] An audio recording of children being detained inside a Border Patrol facility is being widely shared online as the Trump administration ’s controversial zero tolerance immigration policy .
